name: Boa Hancock
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Kuja Pirates
effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Monkey.D.Luffy] or red Event and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Activate: Main] You may trash this Character: Give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.
